page.title: 11A DAY IN MY LIFE (contd.)
page.content: Then I take Buster our dog for a walk. After that I play for a little while then wash and have lunch. For lunch I have sausages and egg white. When my sister comes home in the evening we have dinner. At about half past nine I go to bed. {Survey results}of 11 year old children at{Highweek C.P.School,Newton Abbot.} Average weekly pocket money Â£1.10.Bed time 9.00.Favourite pop stars,Wham, Paul Young,Tears for Fears,Madonna, Frankie Goes To Hollywood.Top hobby B.M.X.,others include stamp,rubber, postcard,keyring collecting,judo,model making,roller skating,scouts and discos.Home cooking likes-chips, sausages,roasts,salads,fish fingers. Top take aways-Chinese,Indian,Kentucky Fried Chicken. "Dallas","Dynasty","The Young Ones"are T.V.favourites.Top clothing,jeans.Top subject-Games.
